data.title: Fast, good food
data.text: This is a good place for coney island food and very fast.  The owner is very nice and greets you with a smile.  Would recommend in the summer especially - seating outside is very relaxing and covered so not sitting in the hot sun.  Great location for breakfast, lunch or dinner

data.title: Yummy
data.text:
Great food and great service here! We didn't leave hungry. Very clean place. 
Easy location and lots of parking.

data.title: One of the best servers ever!  Good food at a very good price.  Modern decor.
data.text:
Went with two co-workers and enjoyed the best server in recent memory.  She was awesome.  Bubbly, friendly and knowledgable about the menu.  Our food was delivered quickly and other servers stopped by to refill our drinks if they looked like one sip was taken from them.

Looked like a popular place with the locals, and I can see why.

data.title: Big breakfasts
data.text: Ate here twice recently while in town, on a weekend. Both mornings, we were seated immediately.  Loved the big coffee mugs. Breakfast portions were quite large and prices were fair. No problem to split an order for the kids. Restaurant was clean, staff nice and food came out quickly.

data.title: Really good coney island with good service.
data.text: This is a really decent entry in the Coney Island restaurant field. With a newer renovation and a decent menu selection, fast service from cute waitresses. Leaps and bounds above the average, with outdoor seating as well, all in great location. Nothing to complain about at all.

data.title: Pass on this one
data.text: The wait staff was really nice about giving us new dinners. Ours tasted like they were from yesterday. Everything was a little dry. Hopefully the second dinner to go is better than the one we sent back.

data.title: Lunch with friends
data.text: Terrific food and even better service! On a busy Saturday afternoon, they sat our group of 11 down in less than 10 minutes.

data.title: Love gyros
data.text: this restaurant offers everything from breakfast to complete homemade dinners.  Nice appetizer selection..  Save room for dessert!

data.title: Not your typical Coney Island
data.text: Came here for lunch with a friend for the first time and I was pleasantly surprised. The menu was overwhelming with many different choices - not your typical coney menu. The waitress was great and apologetic that what I ordered would take 5 -10 minutes (apparently the norm is 2!). Everything was perfect and I did not feel that was a long wait at all for a special order. This will be my new lunch spot!

data.title: Nice Wait Staff
data.text: Wait staff were extremely friendly and in general it was a nice atmosphere.  The food was okay, but good prices.

data.title: Best coney ever
data.text: This place is the best! Nicest decor (for a coney), best food, best service. Always busy but you are never left waiting. You can dine inside or out. I had been going here for years and i love it.

data.title: Great food, great prices, great service
data.text:
We usually go for lunch and get the Greek salad with chicken, which is great.  I only wish the salad was available with spinach, instead of lettuce, as it is at Leo's Coney Island for only $1 more.

The service is always prompt and friendly.

data.title: Outstanding
data.text: Great traditional coney island; best gyros in the state.  Great service and nice ambience.  Great place for breakfast and lunch.

data.title: Voted Novi’s best Greek restaurant - Really?
data.text: We visited this restaurant because we saw the sign outside & thought it would be good food but we were very disappointed. We are not Greek however, we have lived in the area & have eaten at some Great Coney Islands in our time. One guest ordered the Kabob & the meat was tough & they put tomato sauce all over the rice which ruined the meal for him. Another ordered a vegetarian plate & everything was mushy. Unfortunately, it went downhill from there. It took at least 10 minutes for wait staff to approach the table when we first sat down so we certainly weren't going to ask for our food to be done over & this was during off hours. Forget about getting a refill on my hot tea. And what was going on with the cooks & the loud music & language was enough to scare anyone away. I guess when the cats away.

data.title: Always a great lunch and such variety
data.text: The salads are great as is the breakfasts for lunch. Wraps are great too.  Service is quick and friendly.  I have dined here for lunch dozens of times.  Start with a Greek salad.

data.title: Quick "bite" or leisure meal...
data.text: Just very good food, served hot by a friendly staff. I've had various meals here and I've never had a bad one.

data.title: You're Family Here
data.text: Great food, wonderful family run coney that won't disappoint. Service is fast, staff is friendly, and the food is great! Try the AP or JP - our favorites!

data.title: Great Breakfast
data.text: Always good food and service, clean, lots of menu options, good coffee and breakfast specials. Breakfast seems to be cooked in less butter for a healthier option.

data.title: Love love love
data.text: We eat here two or more times a week. It's our go to place. Breakfast, lunch and Dinner.   Love the corn beef hash breakfast. No. 2 corn beef sandwich..  Coneys all their sandwiches are great. Spaghetti is not their specialty! Like everything else

data.title: Very Best Coney Island
data.text: Athenian Coney Island is constantly winning awards for their quality of food and service. And they should. I am a regular here because of how nice the management keeps this place and how friendly and kind the wait staff is. I come probably once a week. The food is always hot. Always comes on time. Always tastes great. It is also a great place to come and talk. Anytime I am meeting someone for brunch or lunch, I pick this place because I know I will not be disappointed. And neither will you!
